overview: In this eye-popping video, pro racers and stunt bike riders from Alachua County, Fla., pursue their adrenaline-fueled need for speed and addiction to danger. With their insane street racing and drifting, these mavericks stay one step ahead of the law -- most of the time. Included is footage from Daytona Beach's Biketoberfest and Porsche GT3 Cup Racing; the 2004 Texas Supra Meet; and more
title: Vehicular Lunatics
